wikipedia_page.main:
Thomas Reynell 6th Baronet of Laleham KCB (1777–1848) was a 19th century British Army officer. He was Colonel in Chief of the 71st Highlanders from 1841 to 1848.
The epitome of a "career soldier" he devoted his entire life to the army and saw a great deal of battle action.

response: *1841–1848: Lt-Gen. Sir Thomas Reynell, 6th Baronet, KCB
